I'll have super powers there. Like him. We can't wait.  Our lights are fading. Look around you. When I was a  child the City was bright and shining. Look at it now. Zor-El and Alura sigh. There is no denying that the brill

It would be sad to lose one of our finest young ones
to the dimension barrier-- but the City cannot last much  longer without the Power Source. It is her future she's  fighting for, Zor-El.
Very well, let it be done. Alura embraces Kara emotionally, fighting back the tears.
Don't worry, Mother, I'll be all right. I've studied
the transmissions from Earth. I know their customs. Kara walks out of the amphitheater with her parents.

I have made clothing and copies of their money, I

As brave as my father. As wise.
